section.name: IntEnz XML
section.p: A XML format for exporting IntEnz data, containing all three views.

subsection.name: Background
subsection.p: We have received a number of requests for a dump of IntEnz data in XML format. Though their number is still little, the XML dump will prove to be useful to many interested people in the future, as its parsing is much more easy and straightforward than the flat file's.

subsection.name: Requirements
subsection.p: The requirements for this format have been extensively discussed in a sourceforge forum.

ul.li: Hierarchical tree (whole or partial) (schema). Includes the single entry schema.

subsection.name: Implementation
subsection.p: The implementation details for producing the XML out of the IntEnz database are described in the IntEnz exporter module page.
